   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Tracktor VFX documentation
==========================

Tracktor VFX is a web-base Production tracker for shot-based projects in areas such as VFX, Animation or Film. 

.. note::
   This project is under active developement.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   usage
   tik_tracktor/index
   tracktor_server/index
